div.p: Group 2 Mapping from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/OrganizationAffiliation|5.0.0 to Extensions for Using Data Elements from FHIR R5 in FHIR R4

tr.td: Element `OrganizationAffiliation.contact` has a context of OrganizationAffiliation based on following the parent source element upwards and mapping to `OrganizationAffiliation`.

title.value: Cross-version mapping for FHIR R5 OrganizationAffiliation to FHIR R4 OrganizationAffiliation

description.value: This ConceptMap represents cross-version mappings for elements from a FHIR R5 OrganizationAffiliation to FHIR R4.
